article_node.title: Best Washing Machines for Your Home in 2025
article_node.summary: The article reviews the top washing machines for 2025, highlighting key features such as Energy Star certification, smart technology, and large capacities. It compares front‑load and top‑load models, emphasizing GE’s high‑feature front‑loader and LG’s energy‑efficient options. The piece also discusses how to choose a washer based on space, cycle needs, and water efficiency, and offers tips for saving energy and preventing mold. Overall, it serves as a guide for consumers looking to balance performance, features, and cost when buying a new washer.
